attributes.action: Annul EU Referendum.Revoking individuals' right to EUcitizenship, non-consensual
attributes.additional_details:
The right to an EU citizenship is one that I and many other British nationals have had from birth. The decision to lose and remove my right to citizenship has been made by people other than myself via public vote, without my consent.

The EU referendum result should be annulled, as it allows other members of the public to influence my individual birth right to EU citizenship, without my consent.
attributes.background:
To annul The EU referendum result, as it allows other members of the public to revoke an individual's right by birth to EU citizenship.
The result of the EU Referendum means that via public vote the decision of revoking EU citizenship of British nationals will be made without their consent.
